MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the G20 postcode area of Glasgow. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:45pm due to safety concerns with our equipment and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:00am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:49pm on Saturday, 21 November 2020
